attributes.action: Improve safety for drivers & pedestrians at Spring Road & Station Road junction.
attributes.additional_details: Royston Smith MP and local councillors James Baillie and Alex Houghton are supporting in this petition.
attributes.background: In light of a spate of recent accidents, we the local residents want action to improve safety for both pedestrians and drivers at this dangerous junction.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Safety on local roads is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor
